name: FOG
label: Looney Moon Records
bio:
Listening to goatrance since 1994, he started djing in 1998 and played at first parties in 2000; in 2004 he opened Looney Moon party org with a bunch of friends, and started producing events all over italy and abroad. Due to the success of the party org, in the end of 2007, the group decided to open Looney Moon records.  
Label dj for the swiss label Peak rec since 2006 and label manager of Looney Moon rec with dj Phobos since the very beginning, dj Fog has rocked countless events all over the globe, including a lot of the bigger festivals.  
He is mostly playing â€œLooney Moonâ€ style but he has also a rich selection of forest and psychedelic / dark  progressive: his sets on any style are rich of unreleased stuff from all the artist-friends around the globe and you can expect to hear long and clean mixes. 
Beside being behind Looney moon records, Fog is also co-founder of â€œCollider Art Galleryâ€, â€œLooney Moon Decoâ€ and the stretch tents company â€œTentourageâ€, as well as artistic and logistic consultant for several other events all around the globe.

name: MICRODOT
label: 24/7 Records
bio:
Mike Neuschler aka Microdot, has been blasting DJ sets of full-on and night psychedelic music across Europe and beyond for many seasons now.

A native to Austria, his first taste for electronic music came from the techno scene in 2002 where he played his first sets and honed his skills. He moved into full-on psytrance a couple years later, which saw him welcomed into 24/7 Records as a label DJ.

As years passed he became curious to dabble in his own productions. And with an appetite for night psychedelia growing, launched the live project 'Filterheads' with long term friend and mentor K.i.M.

While Filterheads has been a great success, Mike's passion for DJ'ing remains just as strong today. He can be seen as a regular on the European festival circuit, dishing out sledging night psy and banging full on sets.

name: HYPEREGGS
label: Looney Moon Records
bio:
Hypereggs are coming, floating from the deeper stars and the darker caves. Hypereggs communicate with their music: they scream while fried, they cry while boiling, always dementially riding between trash and mysticism. Simone Saretta is the human translator of these hyperintelligent creatures. He tries to interpretate with his hands and mind their awesome legends and stories from the hyperspace. 
the innovative Hypereggs liveset entered the Looney Moon family in august 2014. His exclusive psytrance sound takes shape between aggressive basslines and complex rhythms with a taste of "world music", soaked in night atmospheres and lisergic infuences.â€¨ 
Hypereggs just played in parties and festival all around the world, from Europe to Brasil. 
Its first release for Looney Moon reords was the EP "Rum and cortisone" in december 2014, followed in January 2016 by the second EP "Breaking circles", but you can find his music in different v.a.'s and split EPs for label such as Sangoma, Subsystem and Pixan recordings.â€¨ He also took part in collaborations with other big artists like Dust, Dharma and Paul Taylor. 
Hypereggs is a project of psychedelic trance, based between night and daytime, happiness and paranoia, trash and mysticism. Not too slow, not too fast. Just human. Based in north Italy. Looney Moon Rec.

name: CHRIS RICH
label: Bom Shanka
bio:
Chris has been working with electronic music since 2005, and has been stuck on psychedelic music since an early age.
In 2007 he started DJing Psytrance and began playing at nights around the South West of England.
Feeling like there was a lack of the type of sound he wanted, and on a mission to find sounds to move dancefloors, fields and forests alike, Chris decided to begin moulding and warping his own Psychedelic trance music at the start of 2008.
In 2011 Chris signed to Bom Shanka Music, and brings a blend of uplifting psy, with a dark, wobbly edge...

name: DATAURA
label: Digital Mind / Squarelab
bio:
Dataura is the experimental techno / electronica project from UK trance artist Chris Rich.he started his own label, Digital Mind in 2012, and there have been various VAâ€™s and EPâ€™s from Dataura and other artists there.
Dataura signed with Squarelab in 2016, after seeing the effort Yan and Audrey have gone to to promote the niche kind of sound that he loves, and is planning many future releases there

name: ELECTRYPNOSE
label: 2to6
bio:
Electrypnose, the electric hypnosis, is Vince Lebarde's multi-flavored musical project.

Created in 2001, Electrypnose is exploring the electronic music-and-noise world and tries to share its sound universe.
Based in Switzerland, the laboratory doesn't stop to be active. More than 10 albums and 100 tracks released with many labels while Vince also played in most major festivals all over the world as well as all any possible doof parties and club nights.
Musical directions go from Chillout and alternative Electronica, to techno, to progressive for the night and the day, to forest night time and day time full on, then to upper bpm dark and twisted psytrance. Expect a journey and  -made with passion- sound!

name: GIUSEPPE
label: Parvati Records
bio:
Dj Giuseppe is the founder/owner and manager of Parvati Records, the well known twisted/forest psychedelic-trance music label founded in year 2000 and since then based between Denmark and Goa. 
It was right in Goa that Giuseppe had his first encounter with the Scene:  in 1986 @ a full moon party in Baga Beach and in the early 90s he started to get involved for real  with Psychedelic Trance Music organising parties in Denmark with his team, Instant Karma.
Since year 2000, when the Label was founded, Giuseppe & Parvati Records are a constant presence in the global psy-trance music scene, contributing actively to its growth: 72 releases (cds and digital) until today, with music produced by 143 different projects from all over the world. 
As Label Manager Giuseppe has compiled so far all the Parvati Records releases with the exception of the Brainzcrew CD trilogy compiled by Dj Ilse and since year 2004 has been playing dj sets at parties and festivals, presenting a selection of the music released on Parvati Records and the demos arriving at the Label.
The Music and the Label have brought Giuseppe around the world, giving him the chance to meet and interact with party  people in India, Japan, Taiwan, Nepal, California, Mexico, Brasil, Costa Rica, Australia, Dubai, South Africa,  Denmark, Greece, Belgium, Portugal, Macedonia, Croatia, Turkey, Ireland, France, Italy, Germany, Israel, Switzerland, Russia, Lithuania, Bulgaria, Romania, Finland, Norway, UK,  Hungary, Montenegro,  Austria, Czech Republik, Spain,  Slovakia, Marocco, Skotland, Holland and to play from small intimate parties to big gatherings as Ozora (2009, 2010, 2012, 2013, 2015, 2016),  Universo Paralello (2011), Boom (2012-2014) and Eclipse 2012 in Australia.â€¨â€¨In 2012 Giuseppe also started to collaborate as Stage Manager with different Festivals as Ozora (2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016), Sonica (2013, 2015), Modem (2015, 2016), BlackMoon (2013, 2014)â€¨Free Earth Festival (2014, 2016).

Au son de leurs instruments, les musiciens nous invitent, Ã  leur maniÃ¨re, Ã  un voyage mÃ©tissÃ© au delÃ  des frontiÃ¨res, tout en laissant place aux songes et Ã  l'imaginaire.

name: KIM
label: Zero 1
bio:
K.i.M (Joakim Fogelmark)  passion for music started already an early age, spending most his money on Metal and 70's rock records. Got his first guitar when he was 9 and started  bang on a drum kit at the age of 11, and throughout his teenage years play in various bands. Got his love for Psy trance when one of his friends took him to his first party back in 93, and got completely blown away by the music and the atmosphere. But it was not in till 1999 now based in London he first got a copy of logic and between 99 to 2002 was producing Psy trance and djinny in various parties around the Globe. In 2002 lot's to do with work, time in the studio was harder to come by, and he also started to produce techno and minimal house. Got a few releases throughout the years and in 2009 started to work on a album. But this was all about to change on a christmas eve 2010 in Goa Â  Â 
when his house was robbed and lost every piece of music he ever made (even with multiple backups).
With no computer and no way of making music! The natural result is to get together with other people in the studio and what other music to be made in Goa then Psy Trance. The year after he set up the studio in Vagator Goa and over a six month period he wrote a bunch of new tracks and had a chance to work with lots of different producer. The first release came on Grasshopper Records and was very very well received, The hard work is paying of, having played at Ozora  Voov, Modem, Antaris, tours in Japan Alien Safari, Universe Parallelo the list goes on and on. With an upcoming K.i.M album on the way and with his 2 other projects Filterheads (Wildthings) and The rave Commission he is a force to be reckon  with in the Psy trance scene
LINKS: 
http://www.facebook.com/pages/KiM/205813276119940 
http://soundcloud.com/joakimfogelmark

name: FILTERHEADS
label: Wildthings Rec.
bio:
Filterheads is the fresh, psychedelic trance project of Joakim & Mike.
The duo bring a new twist to night psychedelic music.
Concocting a blend of heavy hitting yet funky bass-lines, trippy soundscapes and screaming leads. While utilizing quirky, tongue in cheek samples to keep the vibes lively and the dancefloor buzzing.

In a short amount of time the music has taken the global psytrance scene by surprise.
Launching their debut EP 'Space Apes' which cemented the project and kicked off a flock of festival bookings across the European festival circuit and abroad.
Blasting at iconic parties such as Modem, Ozora, Antaris, Universo Parallelo and many more...

Their 2nd EP 'Darkside of the Spoon' followed, and again has proven that the music is resonating wildly across the globe.
With plans for an album set for a 2017 release. Expect more music and developments, as things have only just begun to heat up within Filterheads lab.

name: YAMAGA VS GINA
label: Hadra
bio:
One of the founding members of Hadra in 2001, Yann is since then volunteer and an activ member of the association.
His musical universe extends beyond psychedelic sounds and gives way for agitation.
He is inspired by colored full power ambiances, where the dancefloor provokes imagination and activates improvisation.

Always passionate about music, Gina had the chance to grow up in an manifold musical universe.
The abundance of the different styles and the possibilitys to combine them, pushed and motivated her to create mixes since 2011 in the style Psygressive.

https://www.facebook.com/7ginatonic
https://soundcloud.com/ginahadra
http://www.hadra.net/label_artistpage.php?dj=37&&lang=fr


"Music is the poetry of human expression in sound and time,
listen to the story and allow you on the dancefloor to release all your energy!"

name: CURIOUS DETAIL
label: Hadra Records
bio:
The awakening of intimate bliss thanks to a dancing psychedelic music.
After classical and jazz trainings in bass clarinet, ClÃ©ment Douillet discovered the powerful musical world of psytrance and created his Curious Detail project.
His music is widely appreciated for his soundscaped textures, milimetrically driven speeches and cinematic orchestrations.
A rolling groovy psytrance, with an excellent understanding of structure and versatile sound-design defines his purpose.
Member of Hadra Records since 2013.

name: SOLAR SPECTRUM
label: Furthur Progressions
bio:
Having started in 1994 as a producer and DJ, Ralph founded the project Rastaliens together with his friend Jay. In 2003 they released the album Â«Xplore The Wild SideÂ» on BooM! Records. At the same time he moved to Switzerland with his wife and decided to start his own project called â€šBraincellâ€˜. His first album Â«Universal LanguageÂ» was released in 2005, which was followed by an impressive string of releases on various compilations and major labels. Two years after his debut, his second album Â«Transformation of RealityÂ» came out. The last Rastaliens album Â«Back on EarthÂ» was released in 2007. One year after, Braincell's third album Â«Frequency EvolutionÂ» was released on Glowing Flame Records and in 2010 his fourth album Â«Intelligent BeingÂ» came out on Free Spirit Records. These CD's were followed by several releases on various compilations. The Â«5thÂ» album was released back on â€šBooM! Recordsâ€˜ and the 6th album Â«Connecting MultiversesÂ» was released on â€šBlue Hour Soundsâ€˜ in 17. February 2017.

Since 2007 Ralph has also been producing tracks by the project name â€šSolar Spectrumâ€˜, which represents the more progressive side of his creativity. Solar Spectrum's debut album Â«Planes of ExistenceÂ» was released on Free Freak Records in 2009 and his second album Â«(R)Evolution of ConsciousnessÂ» was released two years after on Free Spirit Records. Â«The ReunionÂ» EP was released on BooM! Records in 2013 together with his 3rd album Â«Source Energy CreationsÂ» (re-released on Ovnimoon Rec.) and 4th album Â«Droplets from the matrixÂ» (Ovnimoon Rec.) followed by several releases on various VAs and Labels. The 5th album Â«Divine EnergyÂ» was released on Furthur Progressions Rec. in December 2016.

In 2013 it was time for an Ambient/Chill/Downbeat project which was realized under the name â€šUnknown Realityâ€˜. Releases are available on unknownreality.bandcamp.com and the 2nd full length album is on its way. 

Last but not least there are several collaborations coming up with other artists from the international Psytrance & Ambient scene like â€šMelting Pointâ€˜ (together with Earthspace) and â€šDriftsettersâ€˜ (with Maluns).

To date Ralph have been playing on every major continent; in countries like: USA, Brazil, Mexico, Australia, South Africa, India, Thailand, UK, Switzerland and all over Europe etc. and received much praise for his energetic and emotional live shows, DJ sets and production skills.

name: KOKMOK VS ODDWAVE

bio:

name: E-CLIP
label: Iono Music
bio:
The sun and the moon have always been perceived as opposites; the sun is the active, rational, masculine and materialistic part of the world which happens during day time, while the moon is the dark, crazy, feminine and mysterious part of the world which occurs during the night time. There is one magical moment when these opposites unite into one incredible phenomenon, which merges the characteristics of these binary entities â€“ Solar Eclipse.
 
Marko Radovanovic, from Belgrade, Serbia, took the essence of the Solar Eclipse and transformed it into a musical phenomenon that mixes the sun and night aka his alter ego - E-Clip. Along the way, he polished his precision and beat skills while he was playing as a drummer in Hardcore and New Age bands. And as a new star in the celestial sphere of Progressive Trance he absorbed a lot of inspiration from artists such as Jean Michel Jarre, Pink Floyd, Klaus Shultze and Astral Projection. The big change for Radovanovic was similar to the process of Solar Eclipse; where the moon decides he wants to follow the sun's fire and hot atmosphere. Radovanovic fell in love with the heat and energy of the other side of the decks of the Psychedelic Trance parties, and made his move. Thus, soon after he entered the psychedelic world in 2002, he started to produce music as well.
 
His first experiment was under a different more Full-Onish alter ego, named Beyondecliptica, and with it he released his debut album in 2008, 'Groove technologies', in the Greek label Medusa. Then Radovanovic realized it was time to undermine nature's course and bring E-Clip to the world in 2009. Since that moment of creating his unique manifestation, he released music in various labels including: Blue Tunes, Spin Twist, Oxygen, Prog On Syndicate, Yellow Sunshine Explosion. Of course Iono Music spotted his magical influences and joined him to the family. His recent EP â€“ 'Press Hold' at Iono that came out in November 2011 is just a taste of the many trips he will make on the orbit of the sun while inviting the moon to join occasionally.

En 2000, il dÃ©couvre la psytrance, organise de nombreuses soirÃ©es et intÃ¨gre en tant que dj le label franÃ§ais Avigmatic puis le label anglais Free Spirit records.
AprÃ¨s avoir jouÃ© dans divers pays d'Europe, au cotÃ© des plus grands (Infected Mushroom, Neelix, Astral Projection, Painkiller, Space Tribe...), il intÃ¨gre la team Hadra sous ses deux projets Sangohan et Tilt.
RÃ©vÃ©lÃ© par la qualitÃ© technique et l'histoire de ses mix, en moins de deux ans, Tilt joue sur de nombreuses scÃ¨nes progressives avec des artistes comme Day Din, Egorythmia, Loud,Zyce...
On lui reconnaÃ®t alors un style dynamique et soutenu, teintÃ© de psychÃ©dÃ©lisme, Ã  la recherche d'une technique et d'une cohÃ©rence toujours plus soignÃ©es.
En 2013 TiLT sort sa premiÃ¨re compilation, PROGRESSIVE EQUATION sur le label Hadra et devient rapidement dans le top 10 des meilleurs ventes sur Beatport et Psyshop,
PROGRESSIVE EQUATION II est sortie fin 2015 toujours sur le label Hadra Records et travaille actuellement sur une compilation qui sortira sur le label anglais Free Spirit Records.

name: NATRON
label: Solartech Records
bio: Dj Natron aka Laugi hails from the Northeast of Germany, has been born in November of 1983, and has been living in Hamburg since 2001. Pystrance began enticing him in 1999. Loving the laughing people on the floor and the music which put them into meditation he also started to dj in 2002 and went from organising his first small open air in 2004 to organising the IntactXpanda in Hamburg every Winter and the Psychedelic Experience Open Air every May as well. His contribution to the quest for the original Psytrance sound was founding his own label Solar Tech Records in March of 2009. Its motto already says it all: Serious Psytrance. Thru many ups and downs, thankful for the support of his family and friends Dj Natron keeps playing music in between Progressive and FullOn, at 140-145 bpm â€“ deep high quality on the dot with a progressive touch, pumping baselines intended to let people fly. Preferably at sunset or dawn he has had sets at all larger European festivals. The first compilations of Solar Tech were teeming with rolling, deep basses, mind-bending sound figures and hypnotic melodies. Pushing but still relaxed this music is definitely aiming at the mind! In the future international djs from all continents will present their visions of original Psytrance music here.

name: MAITIKA
label: Digital Om Productions
bio:
Fast gaining popularity in the french psychedelic scene is MaÃ¯tika, a Psytrance Progressive Project Created by two young producers Jocelin Varlet & Nicolas Lavenue, old friends sharing the same passion for music since their childhood.

In 2013 they decided to create the MaÃ¯tika project to mix their desires, enrich their knowledge and share their vision of music with the world. Their productions have since then been turning heads around the world and took to the notice of renowned label from India, Digital Om Productions who they joined ranks with as label live act. Now with a few massive releases and collaborations they are ready to present their live and original set to the world.

https://soundcloud.com/maitika-official 
https://facebook.com/maitikamusic

name: CAMBIUM
label: Own Spirit / Senoi / Sting Rec.
bio: Seb discovered psychedelic music at a young age. He grew up with progressive rock and metal music. He started to compose his own songs when he was young. He played the guitar in a band, and he made his first concerts at the age of 16. He discovered the underground techno scene in 2009 and he enjoyed it immediately when he heard the first pieces of music. Soon he became fond of psychedelic trance and all the culture that goes with it. He started to compose livesets after he went to the Ozora Festival during the summer of 2013. In 2015 he joined the association Â« La Buena Onda Â» which helped him to make a name for himself in the Psytrance scene thanks to several dates planned in various regions of France. The sap, the bark and the spirit, these are the universes revealed by Cambium. His music is inbetween earth and space. He transports you in his bright and psychedelic spirit thanks to powerful Goa and Acid tones and progressive influences.

name: ORESTIS
label: SONIC LOOM MUSIC
bio:
Orestis was born in Athens, Greece (1980).
His first musical experiences were with metal / gothic / dark wave and hardcore sounds. 
His own music style, trademarked by deep atmospheric influences, 
strong percussive elements and an attention to the progression of the sonic story. 
Orestis compositions are inspired by the universal flow of our daily feelings and experiences...

name: CYCLOME
label: ADN MUSIC
bio:
DerriÃ¨re l'artiste Cyclome se cache un jeune grenoblois nommÃ© Valentin F.
AprÃ¨s avoir dÃ©marrÃ© la guitare Ã©lectrique Ã  douze ans, il se dÃ©couvre une passion pour le mÃ©tal et les musiques progressives aux structures alambiquÃ©es.

name: LOOSE CONNECTION
label: Free Radical/ Catawampus
bio: Loose connection is a high energy based high-tech live act from the uk and have been smashing dance floors for nearly a decade.They have covered the majority of the psychedelic festivals around Europe and have played all over Australia and in the states. With there unique blend of night time psy they continue to push there boundaries into sonic wizardry and for the listeners pleasure!

name: SOUTHWILD
label: Wildthings Records
bio:
Jay Southwild is a electronic music producer from the south(wild) Black-Forrest in Germany. Together with his friend Ralph he foundet the psychedelic trance project Rastaliens about more then 10 years ago... over the years of playing in clubs and festivals worldwide.
Southwild is Jays solo project and 2010 he joined the UK based label Wildthings records wich is a solid established label for twisted positive psychedelic trance.
After he released his debut album on Wildthings records and serveral tracks on compilations from major undergroud labels worldwide such as Wildthings,Sangoma,looney moon rec.,Hadra just to name a few...

name: ANAKIS
label: Psynon Records
bio:
Depuis maintenant prÃ¨s de 20 ans, Anakis mix, a composÃ© et promeut la trance psychÃ©dÃ©lique. Il a commencÃ© Ã  jouer dans les soirÃ©es qu'ils organisaient sous l'association I.D.O., Maya vibes expÃ©rience (uniquement en collaboration), Freaky friendly et Kristal Sphere. Il sâ€™est produit plusieurs fois au BrÃ©sil, Portugal et Nouvelle-CalÃ©donie, sans compter la France, au cÃ´tÃ© d'artistes comme Mubali, EVP, Beardy, Ianuaria, Ataro, Petran, Southwild, Insane Creatures, Atriohm, Chris rich, Jahbo, Harmonic Rebel ou encore NoMaD25 (pour ne citer que les plus rÃ©cents).
En 2013, il crÃ©Ã© sa propre association appelÃ©e "Illusion Sonore" (IS) qui aujourdâ€™hui a su sâ€™imposer dans le paysage musical de la Trance en France et plus particuliÃ¨rement dans l'ouest.
Son style varie entre la forest et la psytrance construit sur une basseline solide et profonde Ã  une vitesse variant de 146 Ã  152bpm. EnjoY!

Inspired by DJs on a party organized by an old friend in 1994, he began to learn to mix at home then to play in parties which he organized under the association I.D.O, the Maya vibes experience, Freaky friendly and Kristal Sphere. he produced sets several times in Brazil, Portugal and New Caledonia, without counting France, in artists side as EVP, Beardy, Ianuaria, Ataro, Nasha, Southwild, Insane Creatures, Sprocket, Chris rich, Harmonic rebel or NoMaD25 (to quote only the most recent). In 2013 he created his own association called " illusion sonore " (IS) to continue to promote the psychedelic trance that he support from now on more than 15 years.
His style varies between the forest and psytrance builds on a solid and deep basseline in a speed from 146 to 152bpm. Enjoy )

name: SHOTU VS MANU
label: Hadra Records
bio: Shotu & Manu will perform a psychedelic powerfull set like the are using to to at Hadra Festival !

name: DIKSHA
label: Sangoma Records
bio: From the deep and mysterious south american jungles comes the ferocious sounds of Diksha! David has been plugged into the electronic music matrix for quite some time now. Diksha is a blasting mix of arcane synths, perplexing noises, and robust basslines. His music is a serious nocturnal powerhouse ready to make any dancefloor explode with roaring power. Be prepared, this is serious nocturnal psytrance...

name: RASTALIENS
label: Boom Records
bio:
Since about 20 years we are involved into the Psytrance Scence. After 3 years with dj-ing, we realised, that the records from other people were not enough for us. And look at this, since about 9 years we are producing our own psychedelic trance. We started in a small cellar with a little soundsystem. At the beginning we just used simple software-synthies and a small sequenzer-programm. Because of our limited possiblities, it was not easy for us to produce a good quality of sound...Hard work and a lot of enthusiasm caused a booking from some friends in Switzerland. They wanted us for a live-act. Jehaa, our first set, which we played with some quite old synthies, as like Roland 101 and Korg Trident. As you can understand, we were more than nervous. But we were more than happy, that the feedback of our first act was really great and amazing.. So, we decided to go ahead with our crazy music. The time and the more bookings opened us the chance to buy some new sound-machines.
On a special day, we decided to send our first songs to some differnt labels around the world. Wepacked this CDÂ´s together with all our positive vibrations ;) and what happend: Yaniv, from Hadshot Haheizar released our first two songs. "FREAK BOOSTER" and "UNIDENTIFIED SPECIES". A big thank you to you, Yaniv! We guess, we do not have to explain you our feeling, as we hold our first vinyl in our hands. Unbelievable.....

bio:
Kasadelica project is created by Guy Kasif from Israel. The first experience with the psy world came to light in the end of the 90's in underground trance parties. with time passing, his interest in trance music has increased and became a major part of his life. After a few years guy took off from his homeland and dedicated his time for traveling around the world exploring cultures and participating in psy festivals all around. After a while guy wanted to send his own message to the dance floor and began playing in parties in india and europe and started to have is own ideas for music. Guy started to experiment in the production of trance music. 
His inspiration came from the simple idea of creating tunes that will send the persons to a higher state of mind like he experienced in his adventures. Kasadelica like to describe his style as darkpsy, organic and communicative space music. The strong tone in his music is combined from fat base line unique crispy sounds that are alive, but most important is the drive.

Heavy influenced by the darker aspects of the genre, Hellquist never had any problem knowing where to direct his musical energies.

Now, at the age of 27 â€“ Hellquist is blasting track after massive track out of his dungeon. The tunes may vary from Dark Progressive/Psygressive with a â€twisted-tech-glitchâ€-touch to different E.D.M genres such as Techno, Minimal, Deep/Tech House and Dubstep.

First out starting in European festivals in 2013, and later moving to Australia in 2014 he then established his connections and sound and bonded with many of the Zenon records and Aussie crew in the Melbourne music scene.

His live set consists of a mash up of deep, dubby soundscapes and basslines, glitchy textures, and funky progressive minimal psychedelic swampy beats, with elements of humour for good measure.

His productions range from dark progressive, glitch-hop, dub, techno and generally challenges a huge range of genres in a diverse, inventive and abstract way!

Best enjoyed in the sunshine or the night time his distinct sounds have been grooving dance floors all over the world.
Evil Oil Man has performed at such festivals as Maitreya, Ozora, Lost Theory, Boom, Utopia Landing, Earth Frequency, Universo Parallelo, Festival Ometeotl Mexico, Progressive DM7 and many more.

name: EVIL OIL MAN
label: Zenon Records
bio:
Matthew Swain, aka Evil Oil man, is a music producer born in the South East of England UK. He is considered a valuable label artist for Zenon Records for his unique style of glitch out tech-psy-funk.

First out starting in European festivals in 2013, and later moving to Australia in 2014 he then established his connections and sound and bonded with many of the Zenon records and Aussie crew in the Melbourne music scene.

His live set consists of a mash up of deep, dubby soundscapes and basslines, glitchy textures, and funky progressive minimal psychedelic swampy beats, with elements of humour for good measure.

His productions range from dark progressive, glitch-hop, dub, techno and generally challenges a huge range of genres in a diverse, inventive and abstract way!

Best enjoyed in the sunshine or the night time his distinct sounds have been grooving dance floors all over the world.
Evil Oil Man has performed at such festivals as Maitreya, Ozora, Lost Theory, Boom, Utopia Landing, Earth Frequency, Universo Parallelo, Festival Ometeotl Mexico, Progressive DM7 and many more.

With lots of upcoming new music to be released 2017 will be an exciting year for these new sounds to be shared on the dancefloor!

name: DICK TREVOR
label: NANO Rec.
bio:
DJ Dick Trevor (aka Dickster, The Green Nuns, Bumbling Loons, Circuit Breakers & AMD) is quite simply a force of trance nature. 
He was right there at the inception of what people came to know and love as psychedelic trance music and (along with Space Tribe & Tristan) he can count himself as one of seminal producers of the scene that became one of Simon Posfordâ€™s early collaborators and long term influences.  It was in the thick of the 90â€™s melting pot that he met the genius of Neil Cowley and the guitar of Matt Coldrick, creating a spark that kick-started the whole movement with one of the most important albums within the genre: The Green Nuns â€“ Rock Bitch Mafia. 
He has three side projects . Amd with Aphid Moon, Circuit Breakers with Burn in noise and has recently started doing Bumbling Loons with James Monroe on the newly re emerged Flying Rhino

Part man, part machine â€“ he has a connection with his studio that most producers can only dream of.  He has been called upon by everyone for all kinds of musical advice, which he offers freely and enthusiastically.  Never too busy to help, whether itâ€™s mixing down the Shpongle LIVE show  at Ozora or lending an old synth to an enthusiastic teenager and helping him set it up.  He can count Riktam â€˜GMSâ€™, Junya â€˜Eskimoâ€™ & Leon â€˜Avalonâ€™ among his former students! 

He has released and worked on more tracks than most people have had hot dinners.  His work with Danny Howells has seen him dip into the more commercial world to show the dynamic range of his skills.  This will show what this brilliant mind has to offer in his own right.  Get ready for a listening experience filled with the block-rocking love of funky complexity, mesmerizing detail, unstoppable movement and best of allâ€¦ real music.

name: TUNE RAIDER

bio:
Tune Raider (Pamm Legg), is one of South Africaâ€™s top female Psy-Trance DJâ€™s. She has been rocking the circuit for over 14 years and is still growing in popularity season after season. 
Tune Raider has definitely earned her spot behind the decks, and has experience and years of working dance floors all around the world .
Nowadays Tune Raider boasts two very different style sets, a daytime full on psychedelic set and a night-time full psychedelic set, making her versatile and able to read a crowd and work the dance floor and making a good transition DJ between different LIVE acts.
Tune Raiders main calling card is not only her tight mixing and track selection, but itâ€™s her magnetic stage presence and magical charisma that gets people dancing.

name: SONIC ELYSIUM

bio: The concept of Sonic Elysium was established by Alexey â€˜LSBâ€™ Mamzelev in 2008. Having a serious musical background of the Moscow Music School #1 graduate and the education of telecom engineer, Alexey skillfully masters spine-shivering harmonies as well as the sound perfection. Never to be described as just â€˜psyâ€™, â€˜goaâ€™ or â€˜fullonâ€™ music, Sonic Elysium renders the finest parts of all the subgenres into a nice blend of driving bass lines, precisely tuned sound effects and analogue leads rich in melodies, along with mantras and ancient chantings to deliver the  ultimate experience of pure joy, driving the dance floors into ritual ecstasy. Advancing in his musical career, Alexey has recently become a promoter himself. Series of indoor events along with the annual Skazka Festival, meaning â€œThe Fairytaleâ€, and gathering so far 1500 happy freaks in the sacred Russian woods for 3 years already since 2014, spotlight the talent and contribution into the world trance culture.

bio: Logic Bomb was formed in in 1998 by two freshly graduated computer engineers Jonas Pettersson and Johan Kraft who were struck with a profound fascination for psychedelic music. In next few years then happened to become one of the most recognized and original psychedelic trance acts and blow the scene with their unique sound. After more than 15 years of music making, intensive touring major psychedelic events around the world, albums and hundred of other releases on most respected labels things are stirring again in the Logic Bomb studio. The new album is now being mastered and will be released shortly on Z-Plane.

name: ILLUMINUS
label: Z-Plane Rec
bio: Illuminus is a world music/psy dub duo consisting of Dennis Tapper and Magnus Holte. Dennis is a well known psy trance and chillout producer under the name Hux Flux, and has been a professional musician for over 20 years. Magnus, a.k.a MAC-nuZ, has been into music his whole adult life and started his career with the reggae/pop duo Juice under Polygram records. Juice released a number of tracks that became world wide radio hits. After the Juice heydays Magnus joined the psy trance movement as half of the duo Ibojima, but left this constellation after their first album to focus more on his love for dancehall, hip hop and reggae, and have in those genres produced tracks en masse. Dennis and Magnus joined forces in 2007 and have now finally put together their first full length album as Illuminus after a number of appreciated releases on various chillout compilations and many gigs on festivals around the globe

name: TAJMAHAL
label: ELECTRIK DREAM
bio:
Electronic activist since the 90's.

Tajmahal's compositional style can be viewed as a bridge between trance and downtempo rythms.
His style is fluid and deep in meaning: his music narrating the inner story of his feelings.

When Dj-ing, he combines his spotless technical skills with creativity, expressed via his broad and eclectic musical knowledge:  he is famous for telling a story and leading the crowd step by step on the path to dance floor enlightenment. 
This path can encompass different music styles: Ambient, Downtempo, Progressiv, Full on, Psychedelic trance - all within the same DJ set: Taj knowns no stylistic boundaries or tempos restrictions.
Tajmahal is Electrik Dreamâ€™s label manager, but he is also part in a number of different projects around the world. In 2007 he released Â«Â Star CircusÂ Â», his first album for Electrik Dream.                               
Currently, he is Working on a healing chill out project Â«Â UASCAÂ Â» in collaboration with Dj Fluxo (Quest4goa-Portugal). Their album and DVD Â«Â Cosmos UmbilicalÂ Â» will come manifest in our reality in late 2017.  
Taj was Invited by Jean Luc Briancon aka Â«Â Kurtz MindfiledÂ Â» to  participate in the finalization of the composition and mastering of the final cd of a trilogy albums.
This project is an homage to the Berlin School Ambient period, for the analogue sound lovers. Their album will be released in september 2017 @ Electrik Dream records and be presented for the first time at Hadra audience for a brand new and exclusiv live set: Â«Â ANALOGIC TOUCHÂ Â» â€œFrom Berlin School to Electronica Ambientâ€.
This Year Hadra offer him the chance to play twice as Dj, one set will be on the Alternativ stage from Uptempo to groovey techno trance sound.
And a second performance more Chill out Ambient Downtempo oriented in the chill out Stage. 
See you on the floor Taj ;-)

name: KURTZ MINDFIELD & TAJMAHAL
label: ELECTRIK DREAM
bio:
Kurtz Mindfields is a new project from the Jazz Keyboardist and â€œStudio du Vieux Lyonâ€ director Jean-Luc BrianÃ§on (Abigoba, Erik Truffaz, Shazz, China Moses â€¦)
Also passionate by electronic music and synthesizers, mainly by vintages machines, Jean-Luc started in 2011 a great travel around many friendly places (Passionate Collectors, other â€œvintage keysâ€ equipped studios â€¦). 
With personal compositions inspired by pioneers, Jean-Luc recorded many historical keyboards (more than 60!), invited some artists, and compiled in a double CD Digipack the result of 4 years works named â€œJourney Through The Analog Adventure, 45 years of electronic music explorationâ€ (Nuage 7, 2015).
Planned as a Trilogy, Jean-luc asked is friend Tajmahal from Electrik Dream Records to participate in the finalization in the process of composition and production of the the final CD, by using some rare not still using old machines (ARP 2500, Harmonic RMI synthesizer for example), but especially using also the last modern software or hardware synthesizers to create a final homage to electronic music for 2017.                                  
This project is a kind of tribute to the Berlin School Ambient period, for all the â€œanalogue soundâ€ lovers.    
Their album will be released in September 2017 @ Electrik Dream records and be presented for the first time at â€œHadra Trance Festivalâ€ audience. 
For a brand new and exclusiv live set: 
Â« ANALOGIC TOUCH Â» â€œFrom Berlin School to Electronica Ambientâ€

label: Electrik Dream Records
bio:
Allix, aka Lis Rodrigues, is a producer, promoter and DJ - with a musical career of over 10 years singing and writing brazilian music and one solo album released and remixed, since 2011 engaged in research and produce electronic music. She is part of Electrik Dream label, that includes composers, djs, vjs, visionary artists and digital/eletronic artists engaged on the exploration and production of the ambient and healing culture. She also organizes, since 2012, the Moon Dance Chillout Party at Brazil and Portugal.

Dedicated to the study of sonic frequencies, Hindu and Buddhist mantras, has shared special mixes dedicated to Yoga practices and Meditation. Recently, she organized all the learnings about sound frequencies and meditation as â€œNatya Satyamâ€, a dynamic practice of meditation, inspired of 5 Rythms, buddhist meditation and shamanic meditation. At the electronic scene, Allix stands by her chillout mixes that wander for styles like downtempo, psybient, psychill, psybass, glitch, temple step, ethnic and deep trance. Combining technique and sensibility, her musical sets gently lead the listener through a sensory journey. Her Nomad Tales mixes are montly on the air at di.fm/psychill and all sonic journeys can be listen at soundcloud.com/allix.

DJ Lasâ€™hark aka Isabel Neves first started in the Chill Out scene in the late 90â€™s as event producer but soon debuted as deejay in 2000. She was co-founder of the mythical Dreamlab â€“ chill out or die! and co-produced the Chill Out areas for Goodmood all around Portugal. She was part of Boom Festival's production team from 2000 to 2009 and co-headed the Chill Out area until 2002.
She was one of the first female djâ€™s of the psychedelic movement in Portugal and introduced her eclectic taste and multicultural influences in the chill out concept by mixing electronic with world music, fusing organic and ethnical moods to create a joyful sound journey.

name: IVÃƒ
label: Electrik Dream
bio:
IvÃ£ had his first contact with the psychedelic world in 1997, close to the beginning of the sykadelic movement in Portugal. His interest began through visual arts; his education was related to the plastic arts. 
Began around 1998 as a GoaTrance DJ when a friend (DJ Marte) asked him to join a small party. The Muses Rapt was the first project that captured their attention seriously, and to date his friend heart. 
With the help of most close friends in 1999, created the BlueSphere label, he co-produced some events with names like Chris Organic, Mick Chaos, Infected Mushroom and Bamboo Forest for the first time in Portugal. 
He was known for his attitude in the middle, contagious! 
Put some samples in the tracks, taken from sources such as, documentaries, films and lectures, to enable some hearing in Portuguese! Possibly the mother tongue was premiered on land Lusa on psychedelic movement! 
He worked for the label Ayauaska Rec, sharing a label with the names of the Portuguese scene which stands out, Suria and N3xus. 
Over the years his interest to softer environments grew, and he began to improve his technique as a Chillout DJ. He founded the project Tachyon with Daniel (Zen Baboon). In his sets, IvÃ£ creates an intense and emotional journey, using some sounds psychedelic, progressive, and some world music, all mixed in a very happy and relaxed. 
Since 2005 is part of the international team Electrik Dream, with the guidance of Stephan (Tajmahal). 
Through all these years, besides his work as a DJ, IvÃ£ did some work as a VJ and participated in co-production of various forms at numerous parties of nearly all the labels in Portugal.

name: TERRA  NINE
label: Iboga Records
bio:
TERRA NINE
 
Terra Nine, aka Michael Westcot, is the creative force behind this unique act from New Zealand, combining live electric viola with lush organic synths and funky electronic beats to produce a distinctly organic and free form sound. His music features an aural palette ranging from psychedelic ambient to chilled out trance and breaks with uplifting emotional content that moves the heart as well as the feet.
 
Michael is hardly your typical digital artist - his music features a unique synergy of distinctly analog bowed and plucked organic strings - often mangled into mind bending psychedelic sounds and poured in real time over a bottom end of organic beats and fat basslines.
 
Terra Nineâ€™s releases over the past decade have included three albums and a number of EPs, as well as tracks on myriad compilations, all featuring his unique mixture of live organic lushness.
 
Terra Nineâ€™s music has also included remixes by and for numerous international artists - including dub maestro OTT, Astropilot, Suduaya, Kick Bong, Unknown Reality, Pete Ardron, Cloower Wooma, AKD and many more.
 
Over the past 10 years, Terra Nine has toured extensively, performing dynamic live shows at festival events worldwide. More recently, VJ Intelliki has joined Terra Nine, adding fantastic imagery to form the perfect synergistic visual accompaniment to the music.
 
Terra Nineâ€™s latest EP, â€˜Heart of the Matterâ€™ (Iboga Records) - features 5 exceptional new tunes with psychedelic downtempo and dub / breaks flavours - providing a journey into new musical territory - glitchy, yet melodic.

name: JOHNNY BLUE
label: MikelaBella Records
bio:
Johnny Blue comes from Cyprus.
He started dj-ing 20 years ago. His first influence was rock and especially psychedelic rock (Pink Floyd, Ozric Tentacles, etc). In 2000 he got into the electronic scene with a main interest in chill out and psychedelic trance music.
Being influenced by several music cultures (rock, dub, reggae, electronica, psy-trance, chill out), he developed an unique style by smoothly blending sounds in colourful and sensational music journeys.
Johnny is one of the senior representatives on the launch, establishment and uprising of Cyprus' psychedelic music scene. As a founder of Psylent Harmony and co-founder of ChakradeliC project in early 2000 he had the opportunity to bring to the island and play along with artists like Master Margherita, Seamoon, Argaman, Yestegan chaY, Kukan dUb Lagan, Dymons, Organic Shapes, Flooting Grooves and many others.
In 2011 Johnny joined Mikelabella Records where he works as A/R Manager. His first VA compilation titled 'Planet Blue' was released in December 2012 and the 2nd one titled 'Blue Moon' in April 2014. In the beginning of 2013, he became a label dj of Peak Records.
In January 2015 he entered Sofa Beats roster. His VA 'Selections' for Sofa Beats Records has been
released in early 2017.
He is also resident dj since 2011 at Digitally Imported Psychill (di.fm/psychill) with the monthly
radio series "Psylent Harmony" which is broadcasted every third Sunday.
Johnny Blue has various international appearances in the USA , Mexico , UK , Morocco , Israel , Russia and in most of the European countries , in parties and festivals like Boom , Ometeotl , Lost Theory , Antaris , Mo:Dem , Psy-Fi and more.
Links:

bio: Kostas Daikos and Vangelis Alexandris are the individuals behind the Greek project E-Mov. Kostas became interested in electronic music production during his student years which he spent mostly in the UK. With the experience he already had from many years of musical studies and as a performing guitar player in various bands he started composing various styles from lounge to drum'n'bass, over ambient to psychedelic. Vangelis, a well known actor in Greece, spent many years djing in various events in Athens and performing in rock and ethnic bands either as vocalist and/or percussionist. It was in 2003 when they decided to team up, creating a blend of psychedelic and progressive music, largely influenced by ethnic and tribal elements. Guitars, male and female vocals and percussions were ingeniously incorporated. In 2009 they released their debut album at EQNation Records, leading to a fair amount of gigs all over Greece. In 2013 they took another step up the ladder and joined Belgian label Dacru Records. Their second full album 'The Journey of Pan' earned them international recognition and many gigs in Europe, Mexico and Brazil.

The international deco team MAE & MOA started decorating psytrance parties as early as 1991. They have been one of the first to introduce UV decoration to psytrance parties and festivals all over Europe, creating uniquely themed atmospheres and psychedelic worlds via big scale UV paintings as well as sculptures.

MAE & MOA have been decorating some of the biggest and most famous festivals all over the globe. For the last 10 years, they have been working together with the Vienna based Phoenix Firedancers, broadening their scope to show and stage design and perfecting their technical knowledge and experience with various materials, lighting and 3D landscaping.

While MAE & MOA are most famous for their massive and long UV backdrops, they have progressed now to creating and combining their paintings with big lycra and LED installations, turning their imaginative landscapes into a multidimensional experience.

name: ALIJI
label: Inspiral Events
bio:
Since 2002, Aliji has been a regular on the international festival circuit playing numerous prestigious UK events such as Glade, Noisily, Boomtown, Glastonbury and in Europe; Boom, Ozora, Mo:dem, Sonica, Hadra & Electric Picnic as well as the legendary Universo Paralello in Brazil. 

Wherever Aliji is on the decks, you can be assured that the music will capture your heart. Expect to hear infectious beats ranging through Techno flavours or a platter of sumptuous electronica of the most eclectic variety as the occasion requires, whether ripping up the dancefloor or soothing the soul through a blissful sunrise. Be certain there will not be a dull moment! A set from this DJ is always an exploration of the healing properties of music and an exercise in meaningful composition. You can depend on him to deliver the goods, in a gift-wrapped, psychedelic package.

He has shared stages with many leading artists and is widely considered to be a worthy addition to any quality festival or party.
